TEXT.TITLE: ADAMS EXPRESS CO <ADX> MARCH 31 ASSETS
TEXT.BODY: Shr 22.50 dlrs vs 21.74 dlrs Assets 546.9 mln vs 485.2 mln Shrs out 24.3 mln vs 22.3 mln NOTE: lastest assets after capital gain distributions of 28 cts a share in February 1987 and 2.55 dlrs a share in December 1986 Reuter
